00066 @interface Dupes : SSYDocChildObject {
00067         NSMutableArray* dupedBookmarkPairs ;
00068         NSMutableArray* _prunedItems ;
00069         // The above is because the user may remove items during findDupes,
00070         // because it happens in a separate thread.  So, instead of removing
00071         // descendants from _dupedBookmarkPairs during findDupes, which can
00072         // cause a crash due to conflicting thread accesses, we put them
00073         // in _prunedItems.  Whenever _dupedBookmarkPairs is accessed, we
00074         // check if there are any _prunedItems, remove all their descendants
00075         // then clean out the _prunedItems array for next time.
00076         unsigned int iCurrPair ;
00077 }

00143         // behind my back.
